name: Elektrik
description:
Catch all the electricities!  Move your mouse to collect things!  You lose if you catch a bomb or if you run out of time.  Collect a battery to gain extra time!  Collect lightning for more score!

This was created for the One Hour Game Jam #173!  http://onehourgamejam.com 

Update!  Fixed a bug where the score was not being displayed correctly.
